mapper.select: SELECT V1.WK_EXCN_DT , V1.DEST_INFO , V1.SUBJECT , V1.NOW_DATE , V1.SEND_DATE , V1.USER_ID , V1.CALLBACK , V1.T_CODE , V1.ISTLL_KNM , V1.PD_NM FROM (SELECT '20230106' AS WK_EXCN_DT, '01027880061' AS DEST_INFO, '[IoT 서비스 안내]' AS SUBJECT, '20230111134944' AS NOW_DATE, '20230111134944' AS SEND_DATE, 'SP~iot~' AS USER_ID, '15884113' AS CALLBACK, 'Wells18182' AS T_CODE, '고길동' AS ISTLL_KNM, '웨이브매트리스 SS_금융리스' AS PD_NM FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '20230111','01027880243','[IoT 서비스 안내]','20230111134944','20230111134944','SP~iot~','15884113','Wells18182','경원종합','청정기(AN106IWA) IoT' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '20230102','01027880263','[IoT 서비스 안내]','20230111134944','20230111134944','SP~iot~','15884113','Wells18182','하시온','청정기(AN318ISA) IoT' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '20230102','01027880317','[IoT 서비스 안내]','20230111134944','20230111134944','SP~iot~','15884113','Wells18182','조혜숙','청정기(AN106IWA) IoT' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '20230105','01027880414','[IoT 서비스 안내]','20230111134944','20230111134944','SP~iot~','15884113','Wells18182','남상순','웨이브매트리스 SS_금융리스' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '20230104','01027880607','[IoT 서비스 안내]','20230111134944','20230111134944','SP~iot~','15884113','Wells18182','강슬우','웨이브매트리스 Q_금융리스' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '20230105','01027880653','[IoT 서비스 안내]','20230111134944','20230111134944','SP~iot~','15884113','Wells18182','염민아','청정기(AN318ISA) IoT' FROM DUAL ) V1
